author: Lauren Kaori Gurley, Jason Koebler
title: Here’s the Voicemail Whole Foods Sends You When a Coworker Gets Coronavirus
description: "We wanted to take the opportunity to share some information with you ... press 1 to confirm receipt."
content:
We wanted to take the opportunity to share some information with you. Weve just been informed that two team members have been diagnosed with Covid-19, a recorded voice on the other end of the line says. 
This is the voicemail message Whole Food employees hav… [+3242 chars]
